website_summaries.verdict: Nintendo's latest Game Boy has an interesting design but doesn't offer anything you can't find in the company's other portables.
cons: Game Boy titles are looking old vs. more advanced competition
body and screen size may be just too small for some
not compatible with older GBA accessories and older Game Boy games
the more advanced and equally bright DS Lite--which can play all of the Micro's games--can be had for an additional $30

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a rare item
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a rare item, and comes with a charger but unfortunately mine came with noticeable scratches on the front and stickers on the back. It works, and I suppose a new faceplate can be purchased but I would've liked to see the condition reflected in the item description (i.e. an "acceptable" rating). Cool gadget nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of a Gameboy Micro. But when I saw it for such a good price, I figured why not? I'm a game lover, so ok. Well it got here in record time. It is beautiful. I mean, you can tell it's used, but it was very well kept. There are minimal scratches, the screen is clear. And it came charged so I could test it out as soon as I got it out. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cat and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, and was packaged very well! Came with everything listed. Gameboy is a little scratched and dinged up, but functions perfectly. The screen isn't too small that things are hard to read, and the little speaker is surprisingly loud. Definitely get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Keith Minor

customer_reviews.title: I had a GBA, but never even knew nintendo made these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a GBA, but never even knew nintendo made these. Parts are extremely hard to find for this, be aware. You will need a special adapter in order to play with other GBA hardware, which is also extremely hard to find. If none of these things bother you, this is amazing. It's hard to understate how small this is. Take out your iphone, smaller. Did you ever have one of those old indestructible Nokia phones? smaller. I don't think that this adversely affects any game I have played. The text is all still very readible. Be aware if you are looking for replacement faceplates, you're going to have a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: linuxpng

customer_reviews.title: Internally no externally yes
customer_reviews.text: When i got my gba micro it was in great physical condition with very minimal scratches and all the buttons worked wonderfully. BUT i charged it for a couple hours before using it and it would just die 5-10 minutes after using it but the light would turn off like it was done charging after a few seconds of plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Item was not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Micro I recieved was NOT the one advertised. Instead of the BLACK one I recieved a FIRE one.not that ot's a major issue, it's just that was not what I ordered. Works dine otherwise, and also came with SMB Advanced 4, or SMB3, which was unexpected and is one of my favorite Mario games, so bonus, I guess? But still, was not delievered what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ChewyLink286

customer_reviews.title: Small screen is harder to play on than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with everything promised and wasn’t damaged at all. Only complaint is with the product itself. Screen is really small but has an amazing battery life
customer_reviews.author: Amorrow51

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing about a year ago, for $80 new. It is not 4x the price! This is a nice electronic to own, since you can play gameboy advance games ( not gameboy color) and it is extremely portable, not to mention the feeling of nostalgia when you blow on a catridge before inserting it in the Gameboy Micro. The gameboy micro is way too neat, and rare to not buy one and keep it for a life time. I would recommend this for anyone that is a collector, or just a casual gamer. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: For retro consel people
customer_reviews.text: Good for old school gamers that like playing at work lol jk it's cool if old school games is your thing and want to play in places without wifi the Nintendo switch can play old school games for monthly payments and internet connection so if you want to play old school without internet it's the a way to go
customer_reviews.author: RyanWilson

customer_reviews.title: Order a charger!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say, it says maybe one of some things wasn't coming, the box, manual, charger. This thing it's just the console! None of the other stuff included. Now i have to order a generic charger and wait x days just to try if it works! Beside, i pay for one day shipment and i had it in 2 days, it's not a big deal but, you know! P.D.: the product is nice! I love it! Better condition that i was specting!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pagés

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly and just as you'd expect from a Game Boy. Sound is fine, the screen image is fine. There are a few scratches, but that is expected being second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Ftouni

customer_reviews.title: good condition the cartridge reader worked and all the buttons worked perfectlyi
customer_reviews.text: I used it so I could play really good games such as sonic advance 3 and Zelda the minish cap
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Harling

customer_reviews.title: play it all day with pokemon emerald and my collection of mario games
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the gameboy micro new from GameHeadGames and it came with the camouflage, silver, and florescent orange faceplates in the original box with all the manuals and it was in new condition and i seriously play it all the time with emerald and my mario games. it is a black micro by the way. i thank GameHeadGames for the system :)i prefer the black system from the silver because scratches and dirt hide better. It doesn't only play gameboy advance games not gameboy color or the original gameboy games. Only the cartridges like emerald NOT like the pikachu yellow edition for color. hope you guys like you gameboy
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: The right bumper was broken when it arrived, and it has tons of scratches and scuffs. Not worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: System work fine other than that
customer_reviews.text: Screen was really scratched and the charger it came with did not work so I had to order another one. System work fine other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lyberger

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The quality wasn't nearly as good as the description said but it was still acceptable and beats waiting another 2 weeks for a different gameboy
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Charger didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Was so exited to get my hands on game boy micro! The game boy works perfectly and is in good condition. The seller sent it fully charged. When it came time to recharge the charger didn't work..had to buy one from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: the last gameboy i owned was an SP like most of us
customer_reviews.text: Never had one. the last gameboy i owned was an SP like most of us. Got this little thing in the mail. amazing. just amazing. playing childhood games in my pocket. though i have all the games on my emulator on my phone, it still feels cool playing it on the actual handheld console
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tabankin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this machine competes well with its predecessors. It has great battery life, great screen longevity and an interesting shape which fits into a person's hands quite perfectly. I couldn't be happier with my purchase, and I advise any on-the-fencers to hop to my side -- you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: LB button was broken and it was in pretty rough condition
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Dirtier and more damaged than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Experience with product was great, item was just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Sir N8

customer_reviews.title: Too cool.
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing is awesome. I never even knew it existed until i stumbled on one at a flea market (which was beat up) After seeing it I had to have one. Shipped very fast. Doesn't come with extra screen faceplates, just the black. Picture is sharp and bright, colors and brightness level are a bit less compared to the 2nd model GBA SP. It's cool, too cool possibly. If you're a collector or Nintendo fan or even if you have some GBA games you wanna play again, I suggest this. It's small, has an awesome battery life, head phone jack, adjustable brightness and sharp image with nice colors. Perhaps the best GBA model?
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Blake Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase! It said ok condition but came in almost like new!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in a little package
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to play Game Boy Advance games but want something a little smaller and stealth this is for you. I'm a lot older they your "typical" Game Boy player and this allows me to get my Mario Bros, Tetris fix on without looking like a parent who stole their kids Game Boy. A little on the small side so those with big hands or bad eyes may want to stay away but it's a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Used does the job
customer_reviews.text: Gameboy Micro arrived falling apart with screws missing. Needed repair which was not mentioned in product description. Product did function properly despite condition.
customer_reviews.author: neira8

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: small screen, but its small enough to put in your pocket and play whenever. . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Still a great toy
customer_reviews.text: For being an older unit that plays gameboy advance games the gameboy micro is still a fantastic device.I can play games anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: den-draku

customer_reviews.title: Best gameboy ever!!
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of reasons why this transaction was amazing but it was mostly the fact that it arrived early with everything I asked for plus an extra game. The charger and all the plates were in the original box and I could not have asked for anything more. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Hayes

customer_reviews.title: A happy son...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Gameboy Advanced Micro for my 18-year-old son who loves it. He carries it easily in his cargo pants pocket, and pulls it out when he has to wait. He loves it, and it has made my life a little happier since he doesn't complain when we're shopping or waiting at the doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: V. Correll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect aside from unmentioned stickers on back. But easily removed. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good if you want a micro console to take with you.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little device for people who want a tiny handheld that they can take anywhere. The games are great but are obviously limited so I would not recommend this to anyone who wants amazing graphics.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to recieve this product. It was in great condition and works perfect. I play it all the time, its so portable and convieniant. 10 outa 10

customer_reviews.title: Very nice system, despite the screen size.
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo Gameboy Micro is a wonderful piece of technology that is a must have for collectors. The GBM is a small yet powerful system that has a very bright but small screen, fantastic buttons, and truly wonderful portability.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to carry it in my pocket. It is really kill time in the bus which for transport I rides. It is is very nice to have.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device works fine, although it is not black it is silver.

customer_reviews.title: best game boy ever
customer_reviews.text: dude you can play it in the dark while in a hotel room with other people sleeping with out wakeing them up my faviort game to play is

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was hoping to receive a new game boy micro in a new condition but hey it's brand new and the japan version all black !!! It works great as well an look beautyfull! Awesome product!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product works like a charm. You need to understand it's not a Microsoft controller but it handles fine for me and the program isn't that complicating. It's amazingly priced and the person that shipped it to me was quick and packaged it well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gmuer

customer_reviews.title: It's Backlit!
customer_reviews.text: This little piece of history is totally amazing. I mean, really, it's a collector's item for all intents and purposes. Pros: ~Backlight ~Adjustable brightness ~Headphone Jack ~Plays GBA, Gameboy Color, and Gameboy games ~Very portable ~Long battery life(6-ish hours on low brightness) ~Interchangeable face-plate Cons: ~Inter-connectivity between other gameboy devices is very difficult *TL;DR* If you want a gameboy, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Delvis

customer_reviews.title: The best in the "Advance" series
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work just for lunch breaks and whenever I have free time. It was probably the best decision I've ever made.

customer_reviews.text: It came with no charger, and it did not say there was no charger the picture was misleading and it was dead from being turned on. I am pissed off.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The Gameboy Micro was new, and perfect. Works great, no issues. The GB micro is the best piece of machinery you can buy to play the classic pokemon gba games. Best resolution. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: GBAM

customer_reviews.title: Game Boy Micro Black
customer_reviews.text: I had a cassette that actually had 6 lives on it and it was from you. My cat is very good at kick boxing and threw it somewhere in the house. I still haven't given up on finding that one. The one I purchased does what I want without the extra 3 lives though.
customer_reviews.author: susan Isler

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pics are not representative of what you actually purchase. All I received is a Gameboy micro, no charger, no documents, no skins which the pics all show. Also, this Gameboy isn't charged so I have no idea if it even works until I purchase and receive a charger.

customer_reviews.title: -Caution-
customer_reviews.text: Item was in decent shape, but the 'L' and 'R' buttons did not work.

product_meta.title: Game Boy Micro Black - Game Boy Advance
product_meta.description:
Edition:StandardThe Game Boy Micro is a leap forward in portable gaming. In this tiny, cell-phone sized body you have the same technology that powers the popular Game Boy Advance SP. Shorter, thinner and lighter than an SP, it plays all the SP titles on the market. No more need to buy special game cases -- just shove it in your pocket or the cell phone pocket in your backpack when you're done. If you'd like the look of your system to be as cool as thegames you play on it, the new Game Boy Micro is for you. Supports standard headphones Dimensions(WxLxD) - 4 x 2 x 7/10 Color - Black

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The all-new Game Boy micro sports a sleek vibe with portability and comfort, all in the palm of your hands. Switch between four faceplates to match your style and play any of the 700+ titles in the Game Boy Advance library. 

 Features: 

 * Lithium Ion rechargeable battery 
 * Charge lasts 6 to 10 hours; recharging takes approximately 2-1/2 hours 
 * 2-inch diagonal screen 
 * Resolution: 240 x 160 pixels 
 * 512 out of a maximum 32,000 colors 
 * TFT with adjustable backlight 
 * Interchangeable faceplates 
 * 32 KB RAM, 256 KB external 
 * 32-bit RISC-CPU (16.78 MHz) 
 * Measures 4 by 0.7 by 2 inches 
 * Weighs approximately 2.8 ounces 

Note: The Game Boy Micro can play Game Boy Advance games, but it isn't compatible with classic Game Boy cartridges or the eReader peripheral. The handheld also requires an adapter when connecting with GBA players, since it can't use the old cables.
feature_bullets: Ultra-sharp backlit screen with adjustable brightness controls for use indoors or outdoors
